Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This story is going to have you laughing all the way throughout, has some decent fight scenes, and is ultimately pretty enjoyable and very reminiscent of one of those 80s films in style. Kathie Borbon greatly elevates this tale with her amazing charisma; she is one of my favorite actors
